name: LOC Documentation
description: A Docusaurus 3.x web application as the LOC-Doc documentation site with custom-built code generator and unit test tool.
tooltip: The code gen/unit tester is built with Monaco editor, Rollup and a mocked JavaScript runtime.

name: Full-Stack Shopping Demo
description: A self-contained app built with Svelte, Golang and SQLite and can create a single small container with multi-stage builds.
tooltip: Based on the Angular, React and Vue example from Essential TypeScript by Adam Freeman.

name: MicroPython Driver for TEA5767
description: For accessing TEA5767 FM radio module features on microcontrollers with MicroPython/CircuitPython.

name: Live Handwritten Digit Detection
description: Run computer vision with a CNN-based neural network image recognition model trained with the MNIST dataset.

name: SEFR Multiclass Classifier
description: The first multi-label version based on SEFR, a linear-time binary classifier from a 2020 paper.
tooltip: With implementations in C++, MicroPython, CircuitPython and TinyGo.

name: Wa-Tor
description: My implementation of a predator-prey simulation game from 1984 with O(n) complexity.
